About Website

This website was created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I created this website for academic and professional purposes. The first iteration of this website was built in 2017, intended as my first personal project on web design and development. Overtime, I have tweaked and rebuilt the website, paying close attention to the overall user experience and accessibiliy requirements. If you have any questions, please contact me directly. Thank you for visiting and I look forward to connecting!



Last Updated Jan 2021
